properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
katika mateso yote]. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Naubeba kijasiri nasonga mbele
(mbele mbele)
naubeba kijasiri nasonga mbele. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
katika wito wangu]. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
[Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
katika huduma zote]. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
(msalaba msalaba)
Silaha yangu msalaba
katika furaha yote]. x2
